tool.name: Frequency List
tool.description: Takes a text input and generates a frequency list

param.name: input1
param.label: Select a suitable input file from your history

param.name: job_name
param.label: Supply a name for the outputs to remind you what they contain

param.name: pos
param.label: Data input is a set of POS tags

tool.help: Generate a frequency list from a text. An optional setting allows POS tagged text to be handled giving a frequency list of token/POS tags. The top NN tokens are included in the result ordered by frequency.
